document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Cimex ornatulus Herrich-Schaeffer, 1842 : 93
;
Cimex notatus Klug, 1845
[sign. d],
Pentatoma humeros Dalllas, 1851 : 240
;
Poecilocoris scitulus
Jakovlev, 1877
: 83
;

.

subSubSection.paragraph:
New data. Isfahan province: near Ghohrood,
N 33 ° 36 ’22.7’’
–
E 51 ° 22 ’39.9’’
,
29 .iv. 2013
, J. Haxaire rec, P. Ducamps det et leg.

Host plants. On sugar-beet (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1997 b
),
Suaeda
sp. ( Chenopodiaceae ) (
Heiss 2002
;
Linnavuori 2008
; Ribes & Pagola Carte 2013 ), Chenopodiaceae as
Atriplex
sp. ( Chenopodiaceae ) and
Salsola
sp. ( Salsolaceae ) (
Linnavuori 2004
; Ribes & Pagola Carte 2013 ),
Hibiscus syriacus
( Malvaceae ) (Sakenin et al . 2008 ),
Artemisia
sp. ( Asteraceae ) (
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
); on
Zygophyllum
sp. ( Zygophyllaceae ) in salty biotopes (Ribes & Pagola Carte 2013 ).
